items.title: 🔴 WE'LL BE STREAMING HOLOPLUS⁉️😳😳

This is my first holoplus stream as an ambassador! I'm so excited! 😍💕
🕚 6/9 - 09:00 WIB / 11:00 JST

items.title: TYPHOON?? 👁👁🌀🍃
items.body: It was hot a few days ago... Suddenly the temperature outside is the same as my AC!! Do take care of your health everybody!! ><

ja.title: 台風？？ 👁👁🌀🍃
ja.body: 数日前は暑かったのに…急に外の気温が私のエアコンと同じくらいになったよ！！みんなも体調には気をつけてね！！><

en.title: TYPHOON?? 👁👁🌀🍃
en.body: It was hot a few days ago... Suddenly the temperature outside is the same as my AC!! Do take care of your health everybody!! ><

id.title: TAIFUN?? 👁👁🌀🍃
id.body: Beberapa hari lalu terasa panas... Tiba-tiba suhu di luar sama seperti AC-ku!! Semuanya jaga kesehatan ya!! ><

items.title: I GOT GIFTS FROM HOLOPLUS STAFF!! 🥰🙏💗🎁✨️
items.body:
I was gifted goodies from holoplus staff yesterday!!😍😍 (I was so busy I only managed to post it now hehe)

Isn't this the viral macha in Japan?!?! It's all over my For You page!! AND IT'S CRAZY GOOD IT FELT LIKE MY CHEEKS WERE ABOUT TO MELT FROM HOW GOOD IT WAS 😭😭💞💖💕💓

I also got Pista & Tokyo, and if you've never tried it before then I suggest you guys to buy it when you have the chance because the pistachio sando cookies were ✨️ETHERAL✨️

Of course, we talked a lot about holoplus and ways to improve it! We brainstormed a lot and I really hope you guys look forward to future updates! We have a LOT of exciting features in the future 👀👀 The staff are working so very hard behind the scenes, so I hope you keep supporting Holoplus 🙇‍♂️💕

ja.title: ホロプラススタッフからプレゼントをもらいました！！🥰🙏💗🎁✨️
ja.body:
昨日、ホロプラススタッフからグッズをプレゼントしてもらいました！！😍😍（忙しすぎて今になって投稿しちゃった、へへ）

これって日本で話題の抹茶じゃない！？！？私の「おすすめ」ページでずっと流れてくるんだよね！！しかも、美味しすぎて頬っぺたがとろけそうなくらい最高だったよ😭😭💞💖💕💓

ピスタチオと東京のお土産ももらったんだけど、もし試したことがないなら、チャンスがあったらぜひ買ってみてほしいな。ピスタチオサンドクッキーはまさに✨️この世のものとは思えない✨️美味しさだったよ。

もちろん、ホロプラスのことや、改善方法についてもたくさん話しました！たくさんのアイデアを出し合ったので、今後のアップデートを楽しみにしていてくれると嬉しいです！将来的にたくさんのエキサイティングな機能がありますよ👀👀 スタッフは舞台裏で一生懸命頑張っているので、これからもホロプラスを応援してくれると嬉しいです🙇‍♂️💕

en.title: I GOT GIFTS FROM HOLOPLUS STAFF!! 🥰🙏💗🎁✨️
en.body:
I was gifted goodies from holoplus staff yesterday!!😍😍 (I was so busy I only managed to post it now hehe)

Isn't this the viral macha in Japan?!?! It's all over my For You page!! AND IT'S CRAZY GOOD IT FELT LIKE MY CHEEKS WERE ABOUT TO MELT FROM HOW GOOD IT WAS 😭😭💞💖💕💓

I also got Pista & Tokyo, and if you've never tried it before then I suggest you guys to buy it when you have the chance because the pistachio sando cookies were ✨️ETHERAL✨️

Of course, we talked a lot about holoplus and ways to improve it! We brainstormed a lot and I really hope you guys look forward to future updates! We have a LOT of exciting features in the future 👀👀 The staff are working so very hard behind the scenes, so I hope you keep supporting Holoplus 🙇‍♂️💕

id.title: AKU DAPAT HADIAH DARI STAFF HOLOPLUS!! 🥰🙏💗🎁✨️
id.body:
Aku dapat hadiah barang-barang keren dari staff holoplus kemarin!!😍😍 (Aku sibuk banget jadi baru bisa posting sekarang hehe)

Ini matcha viral di Jepang bukan sih?!?! Muncul terus di halaman "Untukmu" ku!! DAN RASANYA LUAR BIASA ENAK SAMPAI KUPINGKU RASANYA MAU MELELEH KARENA ENAK BANGET 😭😭💞💖💕💓

Aku juga dapat Pista & Tokyo, dan kalau kalian belum pernah coba, aku saranin kalian beli kalau ada kesempatan karena cookies sando pistachio-nya itu ✨️LUAR BIASA✨️

Tentu saja, kami banyak bicara tentang holoplus dan cara memperbaikinya! Kami bertukar pikiran banyak dan aku sangat berharap kalian menantikan pembaruan di masa mendatang! Kami punya BANYAK fitur menarik di masa depan 👀👀 Para staff bekerja sangat keras di balik layar, jadi aku harap kalian terus mendukung Holoplus 🙇‍♂️💕

items.title: THE LIKE BUTTON IS SO ODDLY SATISFYING... 😳😳
items.body:
The staff never told me to say this (like seriously this is a non-advertisement post) but like...

Don't you just get satisfaction after hitting 100 likes?? It feels rewarding, validating, I could go all day hitting these likes I swear

id.body:

Bukankah kamu mendapatkan kepuasan setelah mencapai 100 suka?? Rasanya memuaskan, memvalidasi, aku bisa seharian menekan suka ini, sumpah.

items.title: THIS TALENT TAB IS MINE AND MINE ALONE 🔥
items.body:
I will monopolize this section before other talents gets access to it and mark my territory 🔥🔥

I mean, I AM the ambassador here~ hehe~

(also isn't cool that I can title my posts here like seriously wtf that's so cool)

ja.title: このタレントタブは私だけのものよ 🔥
ja.body:
他のタレントがアクセスする前にこのセクションを独占して、私の縄張りを主張するわ 🔥🔥

だって、私がアンバサダーなんだから〜へへ〜

（それに、ここで自分の投稿にタイトルを付けられるのってマジでクールじゃない？信じられない、最高すぎる）
